40859.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「この先は 神聖:
Beyond this point is the sacred Yggdrahill. But a terrible monster has entered! Just now, the priestess Himea
has gone to Yggdrahill herself, in pursuit of the creature. Please help Himea!

40861.「ほっほっほ。どうやら お前さんたちで\n 化け物の息の根を 止めてくれたようじ:
Ho-ho-ho. It seems that you and your friends have choked the creature out. Thanks to you, Yggdrahill is
protected! What? He's not a monster, but Himea's lover?

59028.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「わしを年寄りと:
I can forgive him for seeing me as an old man and making fun of me, but to make fun of Himea of all people?
You're a crazy bastard!

33985.「この先は 世界樹の丘。我らエルフが\n 太古の昔より まつってきた 神聖な土地:
This is Yggdrahill, the sacred land that we, Elf, have been clinging to since time immemorial. We are going to
receive a trial of knowledge, aren't we? Then head to the Wisdom Altar west of Tsusukul Village. If your wisdom is
recognized there, you will be able to meet with the Leaf Spirit.

51936.「この先は 世界樹の丘。我らエルフが\n 太古の昔より まつってきた 神聖な土地:
Beyond is Yggdrahill, the sacred land that we Elf have been holding since time immemorial. If your wisdom is
recognized in the Trial of Wisdom, you will be able to meet the Leaf Spirit up ahead.

33986.<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>「力の試練を受け:
To take the Trial of Strength, you must undergo purification at Maiden Manor in Tsusukul Village. You forgot
that, didn't you? You careless bastard! Go back to your village!

33987.「この先は 世界樹の丘。\n これより お前のチカラが 試されるであろう。\n:
Yggdrahill lies ahead. From now on, your strength will be put to the test. Prepare yourself and proceed with an
open mind.

33988.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「なんたることじゃ…:
What is this? Mstr Kou and Leaf Spirit have lost their lives! You must hurry back to Tsusukul Village and tell the
masters what happened!

33989.<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>「この先は 世界:
Yggdrahill is just ahead. Our Yggdrasil was saved from a near-death experience by a divine light. I don't
know what happened, but we must be thankful for that light.
